turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I wanted to order a drink from the Starbucks by my house.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: caramel macchiato grande with extra whip and hot.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say you want extra whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so a grande caramel machiatto, skim milk, with extra whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay from which Starbucks would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup shortly at the Starbucks at Downtown Portland.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome. your receipt will be sent to you via text message.
